entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 03:29 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.8°C
Pressure: 98.4 kPa
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -10.6°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow in the evening. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
